login_subtitle: Enter your phone number and password to login
login_contact_cs_1: Having trouble with your phone number? Please
tnc_privacy_confirmation_1: By Registering / Logging in, you agree to
register_complete_description_1: Thank you for choosing to join the EVMOTO Family. Our team will contact you within 2 hours to confirm the relevant information. Please ensure your phone remains active. Thank you for your support and understanding.
onboarding_description_1: The EVMoto Driver App supports you on every work trip. With practical and convenient driving solutions, your daily activities will run more smoothly from start to finish.
onboarding_title_2: Support Every Step of Your Work
onboarding_description_2: Every journey has a purpose. EVMoto is here to help make your daily work processes faster and more convenient.
onboarding_description_3: With EVMoto, every work journey starts with the solutions you need. We're here to support you on your journey, day after day.
dialog_coachmark_title: An Electric Vehicle Partner for Drivers' Daily Work Activities
dialog_coachmark_description: Helps connect trips, orders, and activity records in one system with EVMoto Driver.
coachmark_description_1: Monitor your performance daily in terms of daily order count, monthly totals, and customer ratings.
coachmark_description_2: View your complete travel history, income, and work activities here.
coachmark_description_3: Swipe Online to start taking orders and generating income.
coachmark_description_4: Displays the recorded balance from driving activities and ongoing transactions in EVMoto Driver.
coachmark_description_5: Use this feature to add balance according to your account usage needs in the EVMoto Driver application.
coachmark_description_6: Submit a withdrawal of your available balance to the withdrawal method registered in your account.
coachmark_description_7: View balance transaction records, including top-ups and withdrawals, recorded in the EVMoto Driver account.
coachmark_description_8: Access various account features such as notifications, performance evaluation, vehicle and contact data management, to providing feedback and sharing EVMoto with colleagues.
no_order_description: There are no orders in the Accepting Orders section.
hint_feedback: Our progress is inseparable from your every suggestion and creativity, and we look forward to your heartfelt wishes!
otp_will_sent_new_mobile_number: OTP code sent to new number
